issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: GenericTestUtils.waitFor needs to check condition again after max wait time

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Audit for durations that should be measured via Time.monotonicNow

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: GenericTestUtils.waitFor should be calling Time.monotonicNow rather than Time.now.  Otherwise if the system clock adjusts during unit testing the timeout period could be incorrect.

This message was automatically generated.
+1 lgtm.  Test failures are unrelated.  Committing this.
Thanks, [~daniel@cloudera.com]!  I committed this to trunk and branch-2.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #12030 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/12030/])
HADOOP-14669. GenericTestUtils.waitFor should use monotonic time. (jlowe: rev df180259b0cc3660e199e85447c7193bee51751c)
* (edit) hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/test/GenericTestUtils.java
this is probably something we (I !) have been doing elsewhere. Should it merit a broader review/fix?

I would bet the test code is riddled with clock time.  It certainly wouldn't hurt to take a stab at cleaning that up.  Maybe file a newbie JIRA and see if we can get one of the enthusiastic members of the community will pick it up?

I suspect there's more than test code that is using the wrong clock.  Filed HADOOP-14713 for tracking the task of auditing the code for cases that need to be fixed.  We can link the relevant subtask JIRAs there.
